This app made by Sunlight Labs, a division of the Sunlight Foundation that is dedicated to increasing government transparency through the power of technology.
News powered by the Yahoo! News API.\nTwitter search powered by JTwitter.\nLegislator search and information powered by the Sunlight Labs API.
http://sunlightlabs.com\nhttp://www.winterwell.com/software/jtwitter.php
Cool
A few things you can do:
Call your representatives.
Tap "My Location" to find your district's representatives. Tap the call button to give them a call.
Reply to them on Twitter.
If a legislator tweets, read them on the Twitter tab, and tap one to reply.
Desktop shortcuts to legislators.
Long press on your desktop to add a shortcut to a legislator\'s profile.
Awesome

A long official bill title which could go on for a hundred words, or two hundred, or more. There is really no effort to keep these official titles in line with what I think most people expect to be the length of a 'title' at all. More frustrating is that I can't do inline double quotes in layout XML. A long official bill title which could go on for a hundred words, or two hundred, or more. There is really no effort to keep these official titles in line with what I think most people expect to be the length of a 'title' at all.
